scripts.build:wasm: mkdir -p public/wasm && emcc src/algorithms/vocal_engine.cpp -s WASM=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME='createAudioCore' -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_process_frame","_malloc","_free","_set_key","_reset_state"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["getValue","setValue"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -msimd128 -O3 -flto -o public/wasm/audio_core.js
